Fast Hybrid Autofocus (phase and contrast detection)
Full manual control for creative photography
Simple sharing and control with Wi-Fi® and NFC One-touch

specs.name: disclaimer2
value: *1 Services vary by country. *2 With compatible Sony external flash, *3 With compatible external flash, *4 Approximate. May vary depending on shooting conditions and media. *5 Configuration method/Access method: WPS or manually/infrastructure mode. When connecting to smartphones, the camera can always work as a base without a wireless access point. (Security: WEP/WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK), *6 Sony accessories for the Accessory Shoe can be attached. *7 Supports Micro USB compatible device. *8 Starter Edition is not supported. *9 The LCD screen is turned on, shot once every 30 seconds, operate zoom alternately between W and T ends, flash strobe once every two times, turn power off and on once every ten times. *10 Continuous movie recording is possible for approximately 29 minutes (limited by product specifications).*11 Indicated recording time is defined by repeating the following cycle: Power on, start recording, zoom, stand-by and power off. *12 Indicated recording time is defined by repeating the following cycle: Pressing the MOVIE button. No other operations such as zoom are performed.

featureBenefits.headline: 24.3-megapixel APS-C image sensor
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Create images of astounding beauty that surpass your expectations with Sony’s newly developed 24.3-effective- megapixel APS-C image sensor. The same size as found in most DSLRs, this sophisticated sensor offers high sensitivity in dimly lit environments and strikingly attractive foreground and background defocusing. You’ll enjoy the increased light collecting efficiency of a gapless on-chip lens structure, extremely low noise throughout a wide sensitivity range of ISO 100 to 25600, and superb corner-to-corner image quality with lifelike colour, supreme detail and smooth tonal gradations that reveal every nuance of your scene.

featureBenefits.headline: BIONZ X™ image processing engine
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Astonishingly fast, Sony’s sophisticated BIONZ X™ image processing engine reproduces textures and details in real time as seen by the naked eye. The resulting images are remarkably realistic with especially rich tonal gradations and a natural three-dimensional appearance. Whether shooting still images or movies, visual noise is nearly imperceptible, thanks to further advanced area-specific noise reduction. Detail reproduction technology delivers more finely detailed textures while diffraction-reducing technology optimises the performance of any lens you mount to enable advances such as finer details at small aperture settings.

featureBenefits.headline: Full HD movies
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Press the MOVIE button to start recording beautiful movies that are notable for their sharpness and lack of visual “noise”—in your choice of 60p/50p, 60i/50i or 24p/25p*. New improved Fast Hybrid AF provides remarkably fast and accurate autofocusing and tracking while shooting movies. You can also use P/A/S/M modes to achieve maximum control over how the image looks, and zoom with extra clarity, courtesy of Clear Image Zoom. *NTSC/PAL

featureBenefits.headline: The world’s fastest* AF performance
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Capture every subject clearly with unparalleled precision, at record speed, thanks to Sony’s newly advanced Fast Hybrid AF with vastly improved phase-detection and contrast-detection capabilities. Faster data reading from the image sensor, higher-speed BIONZ X™ data processing, more advanced AF algorithms and optimised control of the lens drive delivers approximately 35% faster performance than in previous systems. *Among interchangeable-lens digital cameras equipped with an APS-C image sensor as of 12 February 2014, based on Sony research. Measured using internal methods with an E PZ 16-50 mm F3.5-5.6 OSS IS lens mounted. CIPA guideline compliant.

featureBenefits.headline: 179 AF points over nearly the entire screen
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: In addition to 25 higher-speed, higher-precision contrast-detection AF (Fast Intelligent AF) points, the improved Fast Hybrid AF system features 179 extremely accurate phase-detection AF points that cover nearly the entire image area. They permit enhanced subject tracking plus the capture of fast-moving subjects anywhere on the screen, as well as improved scene recognition and subject size detection.

featureBenefits.headline: 11 fps continuous shooting with AF tracking
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: When your subject is moving fast, 11 fps continuous shooting with superior AF tracking performance ensures you capture the decisive moment. This feature makes the most of the superb tracking performance of Sony’s wide-area 179 phase-detection AF points to accurately track your subject anywhere on the screen.

featureBenefits.headline: Eye AF
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Even when capturing a subject partially turned away from the camera with a shallow depth of field, the face is sharply focused thanks to extremely accurate Eye AF. A green frame appears over the prioritised eye when focus has been achieved.

featureBenefits.headline: Improved Lock-on AF
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Now more accurate than ever, due to advances in phase-detection AF, Lock-on AF enhances tracking of moving subjects by adjusting target frame size to match subject characteristics and ensuring usage of the optimal AF point at all times.

featureBenefits.headline: AF mode
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Matching the focus mode to the subject assures super-sharp results. The 6000 is the first E-mount camera to offer AF-A, and displays the active AF points even in the AF-C mode so you can easily check if you are focusing on the intended subject.

featureBenefits.headline: High-resolution OLED Tru-Finder™
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: View every scene clearly and naturally on the bright and accurate OLED Tru-Finder™ viewfinder, which offers 100% frame coverage. The new optical system with four double aspherical lenses provides a wide viewing angle of approximately 33° and clear visibility from corner to corner. Clear details, rich tonal gradation, and high contrast are yours in both dark and light environments, thanks to an advanced OLED design that lets you more faithfully preview defocusing, exposure, and other effects. You can also fine-tune the focus by taking advantage of MF Assist and a helpful Peaking function, as well as adjust brightness in five steps to match the shooting environment.

featureBenefits.headline: Swift, intuitive operation
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Controls are refined for intuitive DSLR-style operation while viewing scenes through the viewfinder. The mode dial enables quick selection of shooting modes with your thumb, while the control dial and control wheel make it easy to set various parameters.

featureBenefits.headline: Customisable buttons
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Button customisation lets you shoot just the way you like for greater speed and convenience. You can assign any of 47 functions* to any of 7 buttons (including 2 dedicated custom buttons), and assign up to 12 functions to the Fn button for quick access. *Some functions can only be assigned to certain buttons.

featureBenefits.headline: Tiltable 7.5 cm (3.0-type) LCD screen
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Shooting comfort is enhanced by a 7.5 cm (3.0-type) LCD screen that smoothly tilts to accommodate everything from low to high-angle shooting. This tilting flexibility combines with the camera’s compact mobility to greatly expand your shooting options.

featureBenefits.headline: Customisable UI
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: The User Interface takes on many of the features of A-mount cameras to enable smooth, personalised operation. Quick Navi Pro displays all major shooting options for quick confirmation and adjustment. The Fn button also enables swift access to preferred features.

featureBenefits.headline: One-touch remote and one-touch sharing
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: One-touch remote lets you use your smartphone or tablet as a viewfinder and remote control for a digital camera, and one-touch sharing lets you transfer your photos and videos from your camera. Either way, by installing the PlayMemories Mobile app onto your NFC-enabled Android smartphone or tablet, you can avoid complex setup sequences and establish wireless connection simply by touching your device to the camera. You are now ready to control your camera from your smartphone to take a photo from a previously out-of-reach spot, or simply be in your own group shot, as well as transfer them instantly to your smartphone for sharing on SNS. No NFC? No problem. You can also pair the devices manually.

featureBenefits.headline: Capture One Express (for Sony)
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Capture One Express (for Sony) is one of the world's best RAW converters, rendering precise colours and incredible detail. It contains flexible digital asset management, all the essential adjustment tools and fast, responsive performance in one customisable and integrated solution. * Please contact Phase One regarding all inquiries as to usage and support including functional compatibility of Capture One Express (for Sony).

link.label: Free Download (Go to Phase One Website)

featureBenefits.headline: Works with iMovie and Final Cut Pro X
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: This product is compatible with Final Cut Pro X and iMovie.

factualShortDescription: Sony’s latest 24.3MP Exmor™ APS HD CMOS sensor; advanced Fast Hybrid Autofocus system; SVGA Tru-Finder. 16-50 mm power zoom and 55-210 mm telephoto lenses included.
inTheBox: Lens SELP1650, Lens SEL55210, Lens hood, Lens cap, Lens rear cap, Power cord, Rechargeable Battery NP-FW50, AC Adaptor AC-UB10, Shoulder strap, Eyepiece cup, Micro USB cable
envStatement: Sony is committed not only to offering products, services and content that deliver exciting experiences but also to working towards our goal of a zero environmental footprint throughout our business activities.

envLink.label: Learn more about Sony and the Environment

PlayMemories Camera Apps™ requires downloading with an existing Sony Entertainment Network account. Service distributed countries vary depending on the Country/Region. Content is subject to change and may require fees.
Activated when the Fast Hybrid AF-compatible lens is mounted.

World’s quickest autofocus/ World's fastest autofocus: Among interchangeable-lens digital cameras equipped with an APS-C image sensor as of February 12, 2014. Measured using CIPA internal measurement method with E PZ 16-50mm F3.5-5.6 OSS lens mounted, Pre-AF off and viewfinder in use.
24.3MP APS HD sensor: Approximate effective megapixels.
